raw_body: LIYANAARACHCHI – LAL (Retired Director General,​ Civil Aviation Authority,​ member of SLAS),​ dearly beloved husband of Chandrani (nee Dissanayake),​ loving father of Muditha,​ Denuka (Australia),​ father-in-law of Nadeeka,​ brother of Deepal,​ Nimal,​ Daya and Nihal,​ brother-in-law of Ajantha,​ late Ramya,​ Daya and Vijitha,​ passed away peacefully on the 10th of October 2023. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour on Friday,​ the 13th of October,​ from 9.00 a.m. to 10.00 p.m. Cortege leaves parlour at 10.30 a.m. on Saturday,​ the 14th of October,​ for cremation at 11.00 a.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella (Old Crematorium). Tel. Muditha Liyanaarachchi – 0703221898.065329
